Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, mollusca, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (94.74%) toAODG=S: 16%, R: 13%, C: 11%. GRAVY: -0.537, mol Wt: 4238.796; mol ex coeff: .Chemical modification: C4-C25 and C11-C33 but C15-C35 disulfide bond can't form due to a mutation of C15 to S15.Activity: weakly active against S. aureus ATCC 43300 or  ATCC 25923 or E48 (MIC 64 ug/ml) or greater, S. epidermidis ATCC 12228 or G-81 (MIC 64 ug/ml), E-coli ATCC 25922 (MIC > 64 ug/ml), S- typhimurium CVCC 14028 (MIC> 64 ug/ml), S-flexneri CMCC 51571 (MIC >64 ug/ml), and P-aeruginosa CICC 21625 (M(C> 64 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Mao R, Zhao Q, Lu H, Yang N, Li Y, Teng D, Hao Y, Gu X, Wang J.2024
Literature Information.Title: The Marine Antimicrobial Peptide AOD with Intact Disulfide Bonds Has Remarkable Antibacterial and Anti-Biofilm Activity.
